source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_SEQ_00<tab>Griseldis is here, but her mind is elsewhere...
target: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_SEQ_00<tab>アラガーナのグルセルディスは、脚が痛むようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_TODO_00<tab>Slay a chapuli for its horn.
target: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2164401 /var>を討伐し、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DD701 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_TODO_01<tab>Slay a Gyr Abanian hornbill for one of its talons.
target: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2164701 /var>を討伐し、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DD801 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the horn and talon to Griseldis.
target: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_TODO_02<tab>グルセルディスに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DD701 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DD801 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_001<tab>You'd best keep your distance, if you know what's good for you. Say your piece and move on.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_001<tab>誰だい、アンタは……。
帝国兵に目を付けられたくなければ、
アタシなんかに、声をかけるんじゃないよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_002<tab>Looking for folks down on their luck? Congratulations, you've found one. As you can see, my leg ain't what it used to be. Some days I can hardly walk for the pain.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_002<tab>困っていることはないかだって？
そりゃ、大アリだよ。
見てのとおり、脚が悪くて、歩くことにも不自由しているのさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_003<tab>Mornings are the worst, especially after cold nights. Hard labor's right out─too much pain and trouble for others.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_003<tab>今日はまた、朝の冷え込みのせいか、
いつにもまして、ロクに動かない脚が痛みやがってね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_004<tab>There's a tea what helps with it, though...I'd need to grind a chapuli horn and a hornbill talon for the blend...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_004<tab>こんなとき、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DD701 /var>」と、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DD801 /var>」があれば薬茶が作れるんだが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_005<tab>Eh? You'll go and get some for me, just like that? You needn't trouble yourself so...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_005<tab>まさか、こんなアタシのために、「チャプリ」と、
「ギラバニアン・ホーンビル」を狩って来ようっていうのかい？
…………それなら、期待しないで待っているよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_010<tab>...I've no expectations of aid, mind, but if you happen to pass through the Last Forest and stumble into some chapulis and hornbills...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_010<tab>「チャプリ」も「ギラバニアン・ホーンビル」も、
ラストフォレストの一帯に棲息しているよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_020<tab>You've been gone a while. What brings you back to Ala Gannha?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_020<tab>本当に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DD701 /var>」と、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DD801 /var>」を採ってきてくれたのかい？

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_021<tab>Oh, I never meant to... I mean, in times like these, you never think people will actually...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_021<tab>……あ、ありがとう……。
すまない、親切にされるのに慣れていなくてね。
本当に採ってきてくれるとは、思ってなかったんだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_022<tab>This country's hard on people, but it's not just that. The imperials, they...they've made it known I'm not to be helped. A dead man's good for one lesson, you know, whereas a live one...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_022<tab>このアラガーナには、アタシのために、
狩りに出てくれる人なんていないのさ……。
アタシが、帝国兵に目を付けられているからね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_023<tab>You're with the Resistance, right? I suppose there's no reason not to tell you then.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_023<tab>ここだけの話、アンタ……解放軍の協力者なんだろう？
実はね、この脚は帝国兵にやられてこうなったんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_024<tab>My father, gods rest his soul, was deathly sick at the time, and so I'd gone out into the forest, spear in hand, to gather herbs. And then I had the good fortune to run into an imperial patrol.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_024<tab>病気がちだった親父のため、薬茶の材料を集めようと、
槍を手に、狩りに出かけたときのことさ。
運悪く哨戒中の帝国兵に見つかって、呼び止められてね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_025<tab>My weapon marked me as a rebel, or so they said. Not that it'd've made a difference if I'd fought back. I knew what the lot of them were about the moment that centurion laid eyes on me...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_025<tab>奴ら、武器を持っていることを理由に、
解放軍の一員じゃないかって、因縁を付けてきたんだ。
それで、憂さ晴らしの遊びで……よってたかってアタシを……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_026<tab>Didn't matter in the end, of course. Some people just like to hurt others. And by the time I limped back to the hut, it was too late for my father.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_026<tab>おかげで、満足に歩けないようになっちまって、
親父だって、ロクに看病もしてやれないまま……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_027<tab>Too late for me too, aye, and many others I imagine. Help them too if you like─they'll be grateful and say thank you. But beyond that, I wouldn't hope for much.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA127_02954_GRISELDIS_000_027<tab>アンタみたいな人とは、もう少し早く会いたかったよ。
見ず知らずの人を助けるような優しい闘士となら、
いっしょに戦おうと思えたはずだから……。
